name: A boring cube game made by a 12yr kid.
name_original: A boring cube game made by a 12yr kid.
description:
The most CHEAP and BORING game!!!1

The infamous 12yr old (ironically)Yosef Abbasi presents you tooooo(Insert drum roll sound effect here)

Boring cube GAMMMEEEEE!!!!1!

Point of the game:

Reach the end of the both lvls(maybe add some more later) and dodge the bad and mean Green blocks.

Controls:

A-Left

D-RIght.

Story:

An Avrage 12 yr old kid(ironically)had a dream of bieng a game developer. He downladed the payed version of unity( by his own money he has been colecting in the years) and made his first game! The game where a golden cube wants to reach the water and the only way to reach there is the way of the stinky boogers!

Disclamer:

This game opens just for 64 and 84 bits computers and it allows linux and mac.

I made this game by the help of the legendary brackeys and its not an original concept. My friends and family arent professional coders or game devs that can respondand i would like to see your respond.pls respond.

ENJOY
